name: RocketFish
description:
Made for the Mix and Game Jam

You are a fish out of water who must return to the pond. Fortunately you're a flying fish.

 The mechanic I've attempted to replicate is Lilac's dragon rush from Freedom Planet or by extension rocket knights 'rocket' ability.

CONTROLS:

Escape - Unlocks mouse

move - wasd or left thumbstick

jump - space or A

camera - mouse or right stick

Rocket - click hold and release mouse or RB
